TEXT.TITLE: PERINI <PCR> VENTURE WINS 117.8 MLN CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Perini Corp said a joint venture of <Tuto-Saliba Corp> of Sylmar, Calif., and Perini's Western division have been awarded a 117.8 mln dlrs contract to build San Diego-s waterfront convention center. Reuter
